review: Great device.  Super easy installation and setup.  Very simple to navigate and make selections. Would recommend to anyone for streaming.
author: J. Bruce Latshaw

review: Bought it on a whim so my girlfriend could continue Netflix while I relocated my ps4. Item works like a charm. Got this instead if chrome cast. Haven't tried anything else with it though.
author: Christopher Lott

review: I did not realize that you had to plug it into an outlet as well as the TV however the selection of movies and TV shows is very good
author: adam

review: I LIKE IT ,BUT SOMETIMES IT STARTS AND STOPS ,MY ROUTER I'M SURE,BUT OVERALL I'M PLEASED
author: stephen strumm

review: I think it is going work real well for me! And the family!
author: Pat28

review: It is nice when it works but it freezes up a lot - particularly using the slingbox player app - and is frustrating to be in the middle of a program and have it quit.
author: pcs "Pcs"

review: Have two smart tvs , I like the fire stick better because it is easier to use and the setup is a no brainer. I will not buy another smart tv , only a regular one and add the fire stick to make a smart tv. I'm very happy with the fire stick's performance and ease of set up.
author: TomTom213
